description: This file handles AJAX requests for resetting and rebooting various components of the device, including factory reset, reboot, password changes, and MAC filtering configurations.

methods.name: delMacFilterTable
methods.description: Deletes MAC filter entries for specific access points and disables their MAC filtering.

methods.name: delMacFilterTables
methods.description: Deletes MAC filter entries for predefined access points and updates a related setting.
